data.title: Best Place for a Ladies Night
data.text: These ladies that run this are amazing! They make every visit so unique and fun. You could literally go every week and still have a blast! Prices are great and you can bring in your drinks and snacks. Something fun to do before a night out.

data.title: This is so much fun!
data.text: So much fun!!  This studio brought out my creative side, which I never even knew i had!  I have been painting about every few months here..this is a blast, alone, with a friend, kid-friendly times!

data.title: Wonderful experience!
data.text: We created a beautiful poppy painting! The instructors are great at keeping everyone positive about their piece and give suggestions if needed. We will be back!

data.title: A Great Girls Night Out Idea!
data.text: We were part of a group celebrating a girlfriend's birthday and at first I thought I wouldn't like this event as it's been a LONG time since I've tapped into my creative side, but they carefully walk you through each step of the picture you are painting. The picture design is chosen for you, but you can make alterations to it. It was fun to see the variations of other painters. It was nearly sold out (Friday night) so it was pretty cramped - more space would've been appreciated. Also, we were given an area at the back for us to put wine and snacks we brought for our birthday group, but others assumed they were provided by the venue and started eating/drinking, so we ended up having to place them on our already cramped tables. Extra table width would be appreciated.

data.title: A Fun Visit with a Built-in Souvenir
data.text:
A group of five women took a painting class at Creative Spirits during a visit to Sioux Falls.  We did NOT have much painting experience (some had none), but we were all able to come away with a completed painting.  What a wonderful souvenir!

The cost ($35) was reasonable.  The hostess and artist were cordial and helpful.

The only negative was that we did feel a little rushed toward the end of the class.  Perhaps we should have chosen a less detailed painting.
